June 10, 1916 D Halifax and District BBA
Halifax and District BBA 0 Test Piece Contest
halifax-and-district-bba
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Sunny Vale, Hipperholme, Halifax, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £6 and bowl, 2nd £5, 3rd £4, 4th £3, 5th £2, 6th £1.10s., 7th £1. 10 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2013, 8:55 a.m. Nov. 5, 2013, 9:07 a.m.
1 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Willie Wood Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
2 Norland Ernest Beaumont Spohr's Works
3 Elland Silver Band Ernest Beaumont Songs of England [Bath]
4 Black Dyke Mills Junior Walter Halstead Memories of Mendelssohn
5 Halifax King Cross Thomas Hooson Memories of Weber
6 Sowerby Bridge Subscription Arthur Oakes Pearce William Tell [arr. Rimmer]
7 Clifton and Lightcliffe Band Fred Berry Memories of Weber
Unknown Result Lee Mount Willie Wood Poliuto Suite [arr. Hawkins]
Unknown Result Southowram Subscription Joseph Crawford Dyson La Reine de Saba [arr. Godfrey]
Unknown Result Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Joseph Crawford Dyson La Reine de Saba [arr. Godfrey]
